post.text: Our jobs have been destroyed! I am about creating JOBS and nobody can do it like me. #MakeAmericaWorkAgain

comment.author: Elizabeth
comment.text: Up In smoke? Last night as all true showman (and flim flam artists) a siloutette of Trump, blue smoke, and then donald came out on stage to introduce his wife. Then the the true smoke and mirrors began. A plagiarized speech, a lie about being a college graduate, and poof the trumps disappear back to their hotel room another audience taken. Where there's smoke there is fire and whenever a Trump is involved there is a liar

replies.author: Katlyn
replies.text: The truth is Michelle barrowed part of the speech long before Mrs Trump did but of course the left doesnt have enough sense to actually research anything or they find that is true and so is the fact Obama stole almost a whole speech and so did Clinton.

replies.author: Elizabeth

replies.author: Ellisha
replies.text: and he used a song by queen that brian may told him not to use. he has no respect for artists or writers work.

replies.author: Brittni
replies.text: Katlyn False, the media fed you two extremely common phrases 5 and 6 words long, and duped you into thinking no one had thought of it before Alinsky to boot. Not remotely comparable to copy-pasting two paragraphs and shuffling a handful of words around like a lazy college student. Sad!
